simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: SC_ProcessAtpCmd takes ONE command from the current ATS buffer and executes it. It then figures out when the next command needs to execute and it returns. If for some reason the next ATS command cannot be found, then the ATS is stopped. If the command happens to be a Switch ATS command the command is executed locally instead of sending it out on the Software Bus.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine processes ONE command from ONE active Relative Time Sequence. The command that has to be executed is already set up in the RTPs control block, It simply has to fetch the command, execute it, and get the next command.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Send Hk Packet to the ground.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine collects the housekeeping status information, formats the packet and sends the packet over the software bus to health and safety.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Clears the command counters and error counters for SC

simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: a CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references a software bus message

parameterdescription.para: a CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references a software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine determines the source of a request to the Stored Command processor and routes it to one of the lower level request processing routines

parameterdescription.para: a CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references a software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Process commands. Commands can be from external sources or from SC itself.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: a CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references a software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Handler for commands from cFE Table Service requesting that the application call the cFE table manage API function for the table indicated by the command packet argument. Using this command interface allows applications to call the table API functions only when load or dump activity is pending.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: a CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references a software bus message

briefdescription.para: Manage pending update to an RTS table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is invoked in response to a command from cFE Table Services indicating that an RTS table has a pending update. The function will release the data pointer for the specified table, allow cFE Table Services to update the table data and re-acquire the table data pointer.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: index into array of RTS tables

briefdescription.para: Manage pending update to an ATS table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is invoked in response to a command from cFE Table Services indicating that an ATS table has a pending update. The function will release the data pointer for the specified table, allow cFE Table Services to update the table data and re-acquire the table data pointer.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: index into array of ATS tables

briefdescription.para: Manage pending update to the ATS Append table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is invoked in response to a command from cFE Table Services indicating that the ATS Append table has a pending update. The function will release the data pointer for the specified table, allow cFE Table Services to update the table data and re-acquire the table data pointer.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
